name: ATC 4.0 XL
description:
Control the Whole Sky!

The fate of thousands rests in your hands, as AIR TRAFFIC CONTROLLER, you must routinely make split-second decisions to avert disaster! Are you up to the task?

From the flight control center you oversee all flights in your airspace and you need to control all in and outgoing flights. Be aware that thousands of passengers depend on you!

********* NEW iPad VERSION *********

This version of the game has been optimized for the iPad screen. All new graphics and gameplay customized for the iPad are available in this version. Air Traffic Control has never been more luxurious on the stylish iPad display!

***** Find out what critics are saying *****

Macworld 4 ½ out 5
“In short order, ATC 4.0 has become one of my favorite iPhone games”

AppCraver 10 out 10
“I dig ATC 4.0 in a major way. It’s innovative, challenging and smart. If you like sims, then you’ll want to wrap your head around this one.”

SlideToPlay 3 out 4
“We found that ATC 4.0 mostly generated the good kind of stress, keeping us glued to our iPhone.”

PocketGamer 7 out 10
“ATC 4.0 comes cleared for landing by the Pocket Gamer crew.”

iPhone App Reviews 5 out 5
“The thing I like most is the Survival game where you simply need to clear as many planes as you can before the inevitable mid-air collision ruins your day in the tower.”

***** Game features: *****

- Detailed graphics -- from plane blinking lights and runway lights to tiny cars that drive around on the road
- Weather effects, clouds, snow, etc
- Wind
- Night levels
- Elegant touch interface and waypoint system to manage planes
- Collision warning effects
- Sound effects
- Multiple plane types -- from small planes to jumbo jets and military fighters -- all are relying on you to guide them to their destinations!
- Airports with up to 6 runways to simulate a busy airfield! If you have a mania for busy airports, you will be satisfied!
- High replay value with 49 levels!
- Internet highscore leaderboards -- can you compete to be the best ATC in the world?
- In-game tutorial
- In-game help

- Featured scenarios:
- day levels, snow levels, cloudy levels
- plane emergencies
- computers crashing
- hurricane winds
- high-speed military planes
- Presidential visits with no-fly-zones
- and more!
